programme.title: 亲 Kin - EP 300
programme.desc: Rosnani brings Khaled to a counsellor, and is surprised at what she finds out. Jenny meets Zara and is frustrated when she is unable to help her. Zaryf finally comes to terms with his feelings for Rosnani.

programme.title: 审思明辨未来 2 Why It Matters 2 - EP 2
programme.desc: Ride-hailing apps have become the way to get around in congested Jakarta. Yet it is not all rosy for motorcycle riders depending on the apps to make a living. Joshua hits the streets to find out why.

programme.title: The Ellen DeGeneres Show 17 - EP 61
programme.desc: (Encore) Ellen welcomes Will Smith And Martin Lawrence ("Bad Boys for Life"). Sheryl Crow And Stevie Nicks perform their duet, "Prove You Wrong," off Sheryl's album, "Threads".

programme.title: Arrow V - EP 7
programme.desc: There's a new crimefighter, Vigilante, in Star City... and his take-no-prisoners approach forces Oliver to confront his past when he killed criminals. Meanwhile, Thea helps Quentin out, and Prometheus makes contact with his secret ally.

programme.title: America's Got Talent 13 - EP 7
programme.desc: The series is a true celebration of creativity and talent, featuring a colorful array of singers, dancers, comedians, contortionists, impressionists, jugglers, magicians, ventriloquists and hopeful stars, all vying to win America's hearts and the $1 million prize.

programme.title: Simply Nigella - EP 1
programme.desc: Simply Nigella brings us recipes that will be both a pleasure to cook and eat. Think light and uplifting soups, near instant stir-fries, one-pot wonders and plenty of baked treats. The pudding recipes in Simply Nigella offer both indulgent, full-fat splurges as well as ever-more popular dairy and gluten-free recipes, taking a reassuringly simple approach to dishes that often lead to stress in the kitchen.

programme.title: Tilda Appleseed - EP 5
programme.desc: Tilda Appleseed, the small mouse who is as white as the flowers of the elder bush, lives in a little house at the foot of the church wall. Whenever someone is in need of help, she is there with advice, a nice cup of tea and delicious cookies. Every day is lovely in the little village, smugly tucked into the hills, where small and big adventures await its inhabitants.

programme.desc: New adventures of Princess Sofia and friends.

programme.title: Star Wars Rebels Yr 3 - EP 18
programme.desc: The saga continues! Star Wars Rebels follows in the epic tradition of legends with all-new exciting, action-packed adventures. The spark of the rebellion is a scrappy group of heroes with their own unique skills, who have banded together to thwart the Empire, the endless stormtroopers, TIE fighters and to help the citizens of their world live in peace.

programme.title: Make It Count S2 - EP 9
programme.desc: Honey, we shrunk the hosts! Joakim and Charlotte gets zapped to mite-size to enter the world of teeny, tiny critters. There, they discover that ants use Maths to find the shortest routes and that bees know the concept of zero. Along the way, they realise that rivers observe pi as they meander, and the stripes on zebras and the spots on leopards are determined by Maths. It seems that Mother Nature counts on Maths, too!

programme.desc: Eddie Murphy ("Dolemite Is My Name") at Ellen's 12 Days Of Giveaways.

programme.title: Wheel Of Fortune 36 - EP 7006
programme.desc: Wheel Of Fortune is an American television game show created by Merv Griffin. The show features a competition in which contestants solve word puzzles, similar to those used in Hangman, to win cash and prizes determined by spinning a giant carnival wheel.

programme.title: Little Big Shots US S3 - EP 13
programme.desc: This engaging series features kids whose accomplishments in music, dance, academics, and downright amazing tricks far exceed their years. Hosted by Steve Harvey, it also showcases kids who took the Internet by storm with viral videos and celebrates phenomenal children from all over the globe.

programme.title: RenovAID 8 - EP 7
programme.desc: Unable to move without a walking aid, Mdm Zaharah fears for her life every day. When she allowed her friend to stay with her, she did not expect him to fill her flat with clutter. Now the flat has become a danger zone. She needs our help to remove the potential fire hazard and reclaim her home.

programme.title: 莱佛士：光辉重现 Raffles: An Icon Reborn - EP 1
programme.desc: What does it take to restore a 132-year-old heritage hotel? Hard work, plenty of surprises and a 9-month delay. This is an exclusive look at Raffles Hotel's first major overhaul in 30 years.

programme.title: Zoo S3 - EP 2
programme.desc: Jackson and Logan discover a link between the hybrid attacks that occur in Portland and New York; Mitch is interrogated by a woman claiming to be his daughter, Clementine; and a new development in Abraham's research into the sterility crisis endangers his family.

programme.title: You Deserve A Break 2 - EP 9
programme.desc: 27-year-old Gary Lau had a traumatic childhood, became a gang member and was sent to Boys Home. He soon realised that his behaviour would diminish his hopes for a brighter future. Gary picked himself up and worked hard to change. Now, he is an author, a Lee Kuan Model Award recipient and runs a volunteer organisation for youths. As he is entering a new phase of his life in university, what Gary needs more than ever is a break.

programme.title: FBI S1 - EP 15

programme.title: On The Red Dot - Our Lives With Dogs - EP 30

From a world athlete to a feral street dog, On The Red Dot presents 4 stories of the unusual connections we have with our four-legged companions in a brand new series "Our Lives With Dogs".

programme.title: 那些年,我们一起玩的游戏 The Games We Played - EP 9

Game locations include old places like Bras Basah Complex, Haw Par Villa and Pulau Ubin! (重)还记得那些年，我们一起玩的游戏吗？没有智能手机、没得上网的时代，我们打弹珠、跳Zero Point，踢毽子、抛五粒米，玩tikam-tikam⋯童年过得单纯又精彩！全新怀旧户外游戏节目，让李国煌与包勋评两位"老少配主持"，带大家去缅怀简旧日简单快乐的游戏时光！.

(PG)(重)孝义带心心去参观自己和朋友合办的相片沙龙展，心心乍见孝义偷拍了她一系列的相片，心情激动。孝义乘机向心心告白，说自己开始是无心拍她的，后来发现她越来越有吸引力，才不断地偷拍。心心听了感动，两人和好如初。.

programme.title: 心点心 Heart To Heart - EP 1

In 2018, when Da Zhong's grandson Wen Guang returned from America, he sees that the teahouse had changed its name to Yue Xiang Lou (a different Yue from the signboard 21 years ago), and its business suffered as the dim sum had a fusion of both Western and Chinese elements. (PG)(重)《粤香楼》是90年代一家传统点心茶楼，生意兴隆，尤其是老板岳大中所做的"开口笑"叉烧包，更是大受欢迎。2018年，大中的孙子文广从美国回来，发现《粤香楼》已经改名《越香楼》，食物走fusion路线，不中不西。老板岳天华更想将酒楼出售，文广阻止。天华气结，后来才知文广是自己多年不见的儿子。.

programme.title: 魔女的法庭 Witch At Court - EP 13

programme.title: 锁住味道 The Successor - EP 6
programme.desc: (R) Bak Kut Teh is a local delicacy that all of us can't live without. Bak Kut Teh comes in different tastes and colours due to the dialect groups and we do it in the Teochew way. Master Wai (56) spent all of his life into these pots of Bak Kut Teh and is now hoping to pass it down to the next generation. (重)肉骨茶，一个属于新加坡的美味！它叫游客魂萦梦牵，叫本地人欲罢不能！不同地区和方言族群让肉骨茶有了不同做法，可黑，可白，甚至可干。则最能代表新加坡的就是有着清澈汤头，带着蒜头香，胡椒味重的潮州式的肉骨茶！魏月华师傅（56岁）倾尽一生芳华，投注在一锅锅肉骨茶上，从不言累。希望可以把手艺完整的传承给下一代。.

programme.title: 名厨出走记 Love On A Plate - EP 8
programme.desc: (R) This is a showcase of the best episodes from the award-winning series Love on a Plate. Celebrity chefs leave the comfort of their spacious kitchen into the rural areas. Using limited ingredients that are available there, they will whip up a mouth-watering feast for the villagers. (重)《名厨出走记》是个另类的美食节目. 制作队安排平常习惯在宽敞、设备齐全厨房工作的厨师们出走，带他们到深山林中，让他们就地取材，用巧手煮出另类料理。也借由节目，让厨师利用他们的长才为落后地区付出他们的一份力. 该节目荣获《红星大奖》多个奖项，而《精华版》更收集了该节目最精彩的集数，让观众重温厨师们的苦与乐！.

programme.title: 仁心侠旅 The Activist's Journey - EP 8
programme.desc: (R) (重)(最后一集)2010年，新传媒艺人白薇秀首次参与一个“不让她美起来”的电视制作。她将深入印度的血汗工厂、泰北的孤儿院、马尼拉的垃圾山等，亲睹社会的剥削不平之相，感受种种困境背后的人性明暗。社会最底层被遗忘的的心声，对受过新闻专业训练的薇秀而言，是一把什么样的声音？对她有多大多深的冲击？.

(重)候鸟每年依循特定的迁徙路线,从北方寒冷的繁殖地迁徙到南方温暖的越冬地。新加坡是牠们经过的国家之一。因为这里的食物资源丰富，加上友善的环境，每年吸引大批候鸟到这里停留。双溪布洛湿地保护区是最多迁徙水鸟聚集的地方，每年所接待的水鸟约2000只。国家公园局的科研人员还专门为候鸟做保育，包括环志工作。2017年，他们还做了卫星追踪，掌握更多鸻鹬类水鸟的行踪。.

programme.title: 焦点 Focus - EP 28
programme.desc: (R) Focus provides timely reports and analyses on international news and current affairs from Singapore's perspective. (重)《焦点》追踪国际时事，实地报道区域课题，以新加坡的视角分析时局发展的前因后果和潜在影响。.

programme.title: 我的小小美猴王 My Little Monkey King - EP 19
programme.desc: (R) Little Monkey King wants to become the Great Monkey King, so he went out to acquire skills. On the way, in order to avoid the puppy, he transformed himself into a doll. Dabaos father bought him home, to live with their family. (重)小小美猴王要成为真正的美猴王 ,还需要学习许许多多的本领，于是他外出学艺。在途中为了躲避小狗，他变成一个布娃娃，被大宝爸爸买回家，与他们全家人生活在一起。.

programme.title: 孤男寡女 Yours Fatefully - EP 8
programme.desc: (R) Xin Xin discovered the birthmark on Xiao Yi and realized that he is her lifelong soul mate she has been dreaming about. She happily told her mother, Xiu Ying that she can finally get married! Xiu Ying is worried that Xin Xin will cast her aside after marriage but Xin Xin assured her that they will continue to live together even after she gets married. Xiao Yi also lied to his father, Shun Tian that Xin Xin has agreed to stay with the both of them after they wed. (PG)(重)心心看见孝义腰间的胎记，发现他就是自己的梦中情人，高兴地告诉秀英自己终于要结婚了。秀英怕心心婚后会丢下她，感到不安，心心只好承诺婚后一定会和她同住。而孝义为了不让顺天担心，则谎称心心答应婚后和家翁一起住。.

programme.title: 甘味人生 Taste Of Life - EP 290
programme.desc: Zhao Ju Cai and his wife Li Jin Xiu have five children. Devoted all his life to developing soy sauce products, much as Zhao Ju Cai hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father's pursuit of invention, the Zhao brothers' lives are about to change. (PG)赵居财，一生致力研发酱油产品，与妻李锦琇育有五个孩子；居财虽然希望众孩子之中有人接手经營家业，但也尊重孩子们的兴趣和志向。赵家兄弟也因为父亲赵居财的「发明梦」，人生逐渐起了变化。.

programme.title: 心点心 Heart To Heart - EP 3
programme.desc: (R) Wen Guang decides to invite back the previous dim sum chef Liang Gui, but was strongly protested by Tian Hua. He learnt that Liang Gui betrayed Yue Xiang Lou during its heyday, when he sold the teahouse's secret recipe to a Hong Kong company over his gambling debts, and crossed over with the entire kitchen team. This angered Yue Da Zhong who suffered a heart attack, and dealt a strong blow to the teahouse, causing the downfall of Yue Xiang Lou. (PG)(重)文广打算找回以前的点心师傅梁贵，天华强烈反对。文广才知梁贵是个叛徒，当年有香港财团想重金挖他过档，他因欠下赌债，不但把秘方卖给对方，还将整个厨房团队带走，气得大中心脏病发，《粤香楼》也从此一蹶不振。.

programme.title: 溏心风暴 3 Heart And Greed S3 - EP 11
programme.desc: (Part 1) Yadun's good friend hints about an impending issue of the Macau project. Yadun sets Liang Zhan up and lets him take over the project. Xiwen digs some information out of Xunhao and informs Chengfeng. (PG)(第11集上)雅顿获好友提点，暗示他应放弃澳门项目。雅顿有心陷害梁赞，让梁赞接手处理。希文从迅浩口中套取消息，于是便告知乘风。.

programme.title: 学长学姐好样的！ Thumbs Up! Senior - EP 4
programme.desc: A homebased wedding gown designer finds it a challenge to promote her gowns as she lacks the knowledge of managing social media. How does Senior's expertise in social media come into place? Catch the latest episode now! 由于对网络一窍不通，在家经营婚纱生意十多年的婚纱设计师始终无法开拓品牌的知名度。来自义安理工学院的学姐对网络运作一点都不陌生，她能帮婚纱设计师化危机为商机吗？.

programme.title: 攻星计 After The Stars - EP 6
programme.desc: The Top 6 of Zi Yi's Talent Scout Contest emerges, with Xiao Min, Yang Yu and Shao Peng amongst the 6. Guo Yu explains that intensive training will be arranged before the last round of the contest. Xiao Min falls in love with Guo Yu and her feelings are shown all over her face, causing Tian Ai to be displeased. (PG)姿意从选拔赛中选出六强，其中包括晓敏、杨玉和少朋等。国瑜讲解将给他们安排密集训练，进行最后一次选拔赛。晓敏对国瑜一见钟情，爱慕之情溢于言表，令天爱不悦。.

programme.title: 晚间新闻 News Tonight
programme.desc: Daily evening updates on top local news and world news. 《晚间新闻》每日为您提供最全面的本地与全球新闻报道。.

programme.title: 亡者之声 2 Whispers Of The Dead S2 - EP 7
programme.desc: (R) A make-up artist's body is found near a bus stop, brutally hammered to death. Her diamond-studded Rolex watch is missing. Professor Chao examines the blood-splattered murder scene and re-constructs the murder to determine if the killing was premeditated. (PG13-暴力镜头)(重)(双声道-中/英).

programme.title: 魔女的法庭 Witch At Court - EP 14
programme.desc: (R) Zhenxu and Mayi found Nurse Cui Qingci to be witness for Hong Shanhua. They failed to notice Guo Yingshi walked past when they drove away! Jin Hengxiu seeks Mayi to be his defence lawyer but in return, Mayi wants him to provide evidence that could nail Zhao Jiashu.Ep 17 - Mayi sent Yanxi to find evidence at Jin Dongzhi's house, the two however were later taken hostage by Cui Longyun. Luckily Zhenxu saved them and got hold of the video of An Taigui assaulting Kong Xiuya. Mayi used the (PG13-暴力镜头)(重)(双声道-中/韩)镇旭和马翌找崔庆慈护士请她当洪善花的证人。在开车离开时，他们没留意到郭英实正经过！金衡秀找马翌帮他辩护，但马翌要求他揭发能让赵甲树定罪的证据。Ep 17 - 马翌派研熙到金东植的家想找线索，两人之后却被崔龙云挟持。幸好，镇旭及时赶到救了她们，并抢到安泰圭殴打孔秀亚的影像。马翌用影片帮白珉镐辩护。.

programme.title: 天蝎行动 Coup De Scorpion - EP 19
programme.desc: (R) The story begins with Ye Lin being sent to South Africa on work assignment where she meets the dashing Xie Ting Zhang. In a whirlwind of romance, the couple falls in love and exchange marital vows. Tragedy strikes when Xie gets mysteriously killed by mobsters. The disheartened Ye returns to Singapore and starts life anew in a jewelry group run by young entrepreneur Zheng Nan Shun. Nan takes a liking to Ye and begins to pursue er. Just as Ye was about to accept and marry Nan, Yan resurfaces.... (重)《天蝎行动》主要讲述，被骗至南非数载，全部家产都被 郑南顺 (李南星 饰) 的父亲夺走的 谢廷璋 (李铭顺 饰) 与年轻的珠宝鉴定师 叶林 (陈松伶 饰) 在南非相爱成婚。因为黑吃黑被黑帮追杀，廷璋诈死后来到新加坡才知道郑父已故，廷璋发现不知内情的南顺继承了大笔财产而且对叶颇有好感，为复仇廷璋制定了“天蝎行动”，并放弃了叶林，与同被郑父害死父母的律师王重光配合，先帮南顺对付他的对手郭保罗，令郭保罗生意破产，公司也被南顺收购。并助南顺登上珠宝业主席的宝座。同时南顺向叶林求婚成功。然而就在南顺和叶林注册的那一天，郑母出车祸身亡，买凶杀人的郭保罗逃走了。而南顺将和叶林结婚的前夕，又收到叶林当年和廷璋在南非结婚的资料。此事对叶林伤害极深，她在教堂逃婚了。.

programme.title: 真的不一样 Fake It So Real - EP 10
programme.desc: (R) Pearl is an ancient organic gemstone. This episode, Lee Teng invites experts to introduce the types of pearls and pearl accessories, how to differentiate the pearl used for accessories and consumption. He goes to China and Japan to find out the cultivation of freshwater pearls and seawater pearls. (重)珍珠，古老的有机宝石。在本集节目，李腾将请来专家介绍珍珠的种类、了解市面上常见的珍珠饰品，解答珍珠粉的珍珠，与饰品用的珍珠是否有所不同。接着，他远赴中国与日本，为我们了解淡水珍珠与海水珍珠的培育过程。.

programme.title: 开门见餐 Home Dining - EP 2
programme.desc: (R) Alvin See is an IT professional by day, and a chef-blogger by night. He loves wine & dine and spends his free time experimenting new recipes and wine pairing. Menu includes his signature dish Roast Pork Belly, Cedar Plank Salmon Fillets and Grilled Tomahawk Steak. What would the Guests comment after the dinner? Let's find out in "Home Dining"! (重)本地知名美食博客 - 施勇耀，白天是个IT精英，到了周末摇身一变成了家厨。他不但喜欢品酒尝鲜，也烧得一手好菜。他为宾客准备的精致料理，包括了他的拿手好菜 - 脆皮烧肉、做法特别的雪松香熏三文鱼，以及绝对令人眼前一亮的战斧牛排等。欢迎你一起来“开门见餐"！.

programme.title: 新过番客 A Sojourn Home - EP 6
programme.desc: (R) "A Sojourn Home" follows foreign workers from India, Bangladesh, the Philippines, Myanmar, Indonesia and more who came to Singapore to find a living. The series documents how some make it big and return home with affluence, while others are disappointed and forced to leave crestfallen. The series highlights their determination and will-power to succeed, showing us a side of foreign workers we normally do not see. (重)《新过番客》关注着一些来自印度，孟加拉，菲律宾，缅甸，印度尼西亚国家等等的外劳。他们离家背景，远来到新加坡发展和赚钱养家。这一系列的纪录片让我们看到他们的成功与失败，有些富裕的回到家乡，有些却因失败而被迫离开。这纪录片显示了他们坚强的意志，决心和勇往直前的精神，让我们看到他们的另一面。.

Shan Shan finally returns and laments about the fact that she has been hungry the whole day, resulting in Ah Niang suspecting that she could be pregnant. (PG-些许性相关语)(重)阿娘见姗姗在外奔波一天未回，急得如热锅上的蚂蚁，下楼等她回来，见到姗姗终于出现，才松了一口气。姗姗大喊肚子饿，说自己不知搞什么老是屡吃不饱，阿娘又猜测她可能有喜，被姗姗斥责。.

programme.title: 小城花样多 Small Town Surprises - EP 2
programme.desc: (R) Did you know that male and female ducks quack differently? What do mushrooms need in order to grow? How is charcoal made from the trunk of a tree? (重)你们知道公鸭和母鸭的区别吗？种植蘑菇需要哪些材料？木炭又是怎么从红木加工制成的呢？这一集的《小城花样多》，我们的女城管慧馨将带领着李家成员，来到位于霹雳州的太平县和十八丁一起探究竟！.

Xiao Yi and Xin Xin finally wed. (重)孝义和心心注册结婚，顺天准备盛装出席，担任孝义的主婚人。宝花得知后气得跳脚，坚持自己要当主婚人。顺天为免搞砸孝义的婚礼，决定不出席，成全宝花当主婚人的心愿。孝义和心心终于顺利结婚。.

programme.title: 心点心 Heart To Heart - EP 4
programme.desc: (R) Liang Gui was in shock when he walked past Wen Guang and glimpsed a corner of the old signboard revealing the "Yue" before name change. Coupled with Wen Guang's side profile that resembled Da Zhong, Liang Gui fell into a frantic state thinking Da Zhong is back to seek revenge. Wen Guang goes for a massage and realised Na La's massage technique is similar to how his grandfather makes dim sum. (PG)(重)梁贵与揹着牌匾的文广错身而过，他看到牌匾一角露出部分"粤"字，脸色大变，又发现文广的侧脸很像大中，想起自己害得大中中风的往事，以为大中回来找他算账，惊恐不已。文广找娜拉按摩，发现娜拉的手法与祖父做点心的手势一样。.

programme.desc: (Part 2) It turns out that Crystal knows Chengfeng. When Chengfeng voices his concern over the Macau project, Crystal orders an investigation. She decides to abort the project thereafter. However, Liang Zhan is adamant to proceed. (PG)(第11集下)Crystal原来早与乘风认识。乘风直言对澳门计划有点担心。Crystal调查后决定放弃参与计划。梁赞正要出发到澳门签意向书，丽荧急忙阻止，梁赞却坚持。.

programme.title: 极件任务 Mission Delivery - EP 7
programme.desc: The World Alba White Truffle Auction is one of the biggest truffle events each year and for the first time, it's coming to Singapore. In this episode, follow host Paige Chua to a small town in Italy, where she races against time to bring these perishable fungi back to Singapore for the event. “世界阿尔巴白松露拍卖会”是意大利一年一度的重要盛事；今年，新加坡将首次参与这个跨国竞标活动。这一集，特派员蔡琦慧将飞到白松露产地，将一批极为珍贵、又极为脆弱的真菌，千里迢迢地带回新加坡，送到拍卖会场地。.

programme.title: 星期二特写 - 飞羽 Tuesday Report - Migratory Birds - EP 2
攻星计 After The Stars - EP 7
programme.desc: Tian Ai is troubled as Wen Wen needs someone to replace her for the advertisement shoot. Yi Ting secretly meets the producer of the advertisement, convincing her to let Guo Yao replace Wen Wen. The producer contacts Tian Ai, agreeing to her requests but specifically asks for Guo Yao as replacement. Tian Ai is kept in the dark. (PG)雯雯无法工作，签下的广告必须换角，天爱烦恼。怡婷暗中找广告制作人，说服她让郭瑶顶上。制作人致电天爱，答应换角，但指明要郭瑶代替。天爱被蒙在鼓里。.

programme.title: 晚间新闻 News Tonight
programme.desc: Daily evening updates on top local news and world news. 《晚间新闻》每日为您提供最全面的本地与全球新闻报道。.

programme.title: 女人好健康 Good Health Women - EP 11
programme.desc: Darren hosts this new healthcare program that explores both Western & traditional approaches to womens illnesses from a male perspective. 主持庄文杰这次担任女人健康大使，找来中医、西医、物理治疗师从多个角度分享女人健康密码，了解与预防女人常见的毛病如经痛，中风，慢性疲劳等等。.

programme.title: 食材地图 Our Daily Food - EP 8
programme.desc: (R) In this episode, Cui Fang learns about the cultivation of Liberica coffee beans in Malaysia and gets to pick the rare Matsutake mushrooms in Yunnan. Pornsak is in Australia to experience chocolate making and learns about the cultivation of black truffles. He also has fun picking longans in Thailand. (重)在这一集节目中，林翠芳前往马来西亚了解利比利卡咖啡豆的种植,并前往中国云南，跟随当地采菌人采摘珍稀的松茸。Pornsak则前往澳大利亚体验巧克力的制作和了解黑松露的培植。他也到泰国体验采摘龙眼的乐趣。.

programme.title: 购物王路易 Shopaholic Louis - EP 21
programme.desc: (R) Shanqiu gives himself up to the police. He confesses to the police that he initially just wanted to create a minor car accident to cause minor injury to Louis to get him to return to France. Little did he expect that events spun out of control resulting in a fatality. During interrogation, Manager Ju frames Shanqiu for instigating the kidnapping of Fushi. This contradicts Shanqiu's statement so the police conduct more interrogation. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)善求去自首，他向警方坦承他本来只是打算引发车祸小事故让路易受点小伤回法国的，却没料到事情发展会失去控制闹出人命。具室长在接受审问时，诬陷善求指使绑架福实，跟善求的供词有所出入，警方于是需要再进行审问。.

programme.title: 购物王路易 Shopaholic Louis - EP 22
programme.desc: (R) Haojun proposes to Qinglan. Qinglan is moved by his sincerity and accepts his proposal. Louis, Fushi and the rest get busy preparing the wedding for the two. On the wedding day, Louis develops a strong urge to take care of Fushi and ponders how to propose to Fushi. Mary still loves Zhongyuan so she starts to make the move. (PG)(重)(大结局)(双声道-中/韩)浩俊向青兰求婚。 青兰被他的真诚感动，答应嫁给他。路易和福实等都忙着为他们俩筹备婚礼。在他们俩大喜之日，令路易更想照顾福实，思考着要怎么向福实求婚。玛丽对中元的爱意仍在，于是开始对中元发动攻势。.

programme.title: 注定 Show Hand - EP 2
programme.desc: (R) Do we lead a fated life or do we decide our own destiny? Cast: Christopher Lee, Chew Chor Meng, Cynthia Koh, Ann Kok, Ian Fang, Kimberly Chia. (PG)(重)人生每一个关口的决定，是早就被'注定'了，还是等待自己来'决定'呢？演员: 李铭顺, 周初明, 许美珍, 郭舒贤, 方伟杰, 谢静仪。.

programme.title: 线人 3 Fixer 3 - EP 2
programme.desc: (R) Naples, the birthplace of pizza, has been infamously known as a garbage city. Environmental groups have estimated that the Mafia has dumped and buried more than 10 million tons of industrial waste in this area for the past 20 years and the residents are struggling to cope with stinky garbage daily. (重)意大利南部城市那不勒斯， 除了是披萨的发源地，长久以来都难以摆脱垃圾城市的恶名。环保团体估计，黑手党在这20年内，在这一带倾倒和掩埋的工业废弃物多达千万吨。让这里的居民日以继夜与恶臭的垃圾展开拉锯战。.

programme.title: 拜托了，妈妈 All About My Mom - EP 22
programme.desc: (R) Zhen-ai confides in Yingshan when she wonders if she should continue to be in a relationship with Xuncai. Caili is miserable after her break-up with Hengshun. She goes to Hengshun's house in the middle of the night and discovers that Shanyu is Hengshun's mother. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)真爱不清楚勋才的家庭状况，担心如果跟勋才结婚，婚后会很辛苦，开始举棋不定，向英善倾诉。采莉因为跟亨顺结束了恋情而吃不下、睡不着。采莉在深夜里到亨顺的家查看，发现珊玉竟然是亨顺的母亲，更加确定自己被耍了。.

programme.title: 嫉妒的化身 Jealousy Incarnate - EP 17
programme.desc: (R) Nali worries that she may not make it back to the TV station in time for the senior anchor audition as she has to do outdoor filming on the same day. Zhuxi, who has also signed up for the audition, gloats to see Nali in distress. Zhengyuan asks his mother, Tailuo, to adjust the audition schedule. Tailuo seizes the opportunity to demand Zhengyuan to break up with Nali. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)娜丽收到资深主播试镜时间的短信后，担忧当天在外景录影会赶不及回电视台试镜。另一边也报名参加了主播试镜的珠熙看到娜丽在发愁，开始幸灾乐祸。正元去找母亲泰罗会长，请她调整试镜的时间。泰罗趁机提出了自己的条件，要正元和娜丽分手。.

programme.title: 爸不得爱你 Father, I'll Take Care Of You - EP 23
programme.desc: Ting-en weeps when Xianyu does not show up at the cinema. Xianyu is touched to see Ting-en crying over him and decides to start a relationship with her. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)廷恩在电影院等不到贤宇而伤心流泪。贤宇看到为他难过得廷恩，被她感动，问廷恩是否要跟他交往。.

programme.title: 爸不得爱你 Father, I'll Take Care Of You - EP 24
programme.desc: Haili warns Ting-en against Xianyu. Haili is wary of Xianyu as he is good-looking and is also very mysterious. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)海利察觉到廷恩对贤宇有好感，于是警告廷恩绝对不可以跟贤宇在一起。海利觉得贤宇的长相太好，背景又很神秘，绝对是个有问题的人。.

programme.title: 非一般递送 Special Delivery - EP 9
programme.desc: Host Carla Dunareanu travels to Bangkok to meet an extraordinary father-son pair. Walter and his boy Zy have scaled peaks like Mt Kilimanjaro, Gunung Kinabalu, Fuji-san and more. Zy is physically disabled and they are the heart and soul of "Climb to Change a Life". By organising climbs, they are empowering and inspiring parents and special needs children in South-east Asia to transcend the emotional and mental boundaries drawn by physical limitations and societal prejudice. 六位主持人，各有不同的背景却身负同样的使命 – 递送非一般的物品给有需要的族群。他们的任务遍布亚洲偏僻各地，将考验他们的恒心、毅力与韧性。 秉持完成递送任务的坚定目标， 主持人将带领观众踏上一趟趟希望之旅，透过13集节目，让观众们感受《非一般的递送》送出的每一份快乐和感动。.

programme.title: 整形背后 Plastic Surgery Is My Business - EP 1
programme.desc: As one of the top plastic surgeons in Singapore, A-Prof Vincent Yeow constantly seeks balance between function and form. This episode juxtaposes the experiences of two patients in the journey towards cleft lip repair; one a baby about to take his first step, and another a teenager taking her last. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(首播)姚国龙副教授是新加坡其中一名顶尖的整形外科医生，主要负责医疗和美学案例。通过姚副教授和他团队的整形工作，这个系列引领观众透视令人惊叹的整形世界。.

programme.title: 回转干探 Life On Mars - EP 9
programme.desc: Taizhu and team are investigating a case baseball match tickets scalping. Taizhu recalled memories of his father attempting all means to get him an endorsed baseball. When he tells his team the score of the final match, his team is shocked. (PG13-部分画面令人不安)(双声道-中/韩)泰柱团队在调查一宗卖黄牛棒球票案，在过程中，泰柱回想他父亲如何全力以赴为他争取一粒拥有球员签名的棒球。当泰柱说出球赛最终的成绩，大家大吃一惊。.

programme.title: 晚间新闻 News Tonight
programme.desc: A comprehensive half-hour news programme, NEWS TONIGHT provides viewers with important local, international and financial developments for the day. U频道《晚间新闻》，在半小时里除深入报道本地与国际要闻，还有详尽的财经新闻和体坛动态。世界局势与经济动脉，让大家轻松掌握。.

programme.title: 你那边怎样.我这边OK - 台湾篇 All Is Well - Taiwan - EP 1
programme.desc: (R) A cargo ship sailed quietly along the offshore of The Philippines. A crew member, Ma Dong Bao, smuggled people up the ship and killed the rest of the members, leaving only Cai Fu Lai, the chef, to live. Cai Fu Lai, Eric and Dong Huang are good friends who grew up together. Eric faked his education credentials to work at Singapore's Teng Sheng Bank, but his act gets exposed by Linda, the director, and is threatened by her. (PG-些许暴力画面)(重)菲律宾外海，货船“孝亲号”安静地航行。船员马东宝暗中带人上船，杀死其他船员，只留下厨师蔡富莱一个活口。蔡富莱与Eric、栋煌是一起长大的好友。Eric假造学历进入新加坡腾升银行工作，被主管Linda识破而威胁他。Eric被逼下，答应网友Justin邀请，到台湾参加提款测试…….

programme.title: 你那边怎样.我这边OK - 台湾篇 All Is Well - Taiwan - EP 2
programme.desc: (R) Eric and Dong Huang unknowingly get involved in an ATM heist after participating in the test. Justin deceives Eric about the program being bought by a security company and they would pay him, putting Eric at ease. Teng Sheng Bank found that the ATM was attacked by hackers and 80 million was "robbed". Vice president Guo Yan Feng ordered the police and media to keep it a secret, however, the news still spread online, and rookie reporter Liu Wei Yun finds out about the incident. (PG)(重)Eric、栋煌因参加测试而卷入提款机盗领案，却不自知。Justin欺骗Eric有关程序已被一资安公司买下，并付款给他，Eric感放心。腾升银行发现提款机被骇客攻击，盗领8千万，副总裁郭延丰下令对警方和媒体保密，然而网路上还是传出风声，被菜鸟记者刘维芸发现。.

programme.title: JML Home Shopping - Infomercial
programme.desc: Programme is not available for live streaming. 直播节目暂时无法观看。.

programme.title: 谁来晚餐2019 Guess Who 2019 - EP 2
programme.desc: Celebrities will be invited to visit a family and join them for dinner. The family will have no idea who the celebrity will be before hand. The invited celebrity will share his or her experience with the family through conversation during a meal. “谁来晚餐” 是个时下颇为流行的实况电视节目. 每集节目都拜访一个家庭,并邀请他们的梦幻嘉宾上门共进晚餐.内容没有太多刻意的安排, 也许是小小梦想的完成, 也可能会看到名人卸下包装与身段之后的真情流露。.

programme.title: 吃。东西 World Food - EP 9
programme.desc: Curry powder is a mixture of grinded spices and known as curry when cooked. Curry dishes from around the world are ever-changing, creating an irresistible and captivating taste from the spices. This episode, Guo Liang, Axian and Pornsak introduce curry from different regions of the East and West. 将香料研磨成粉再混合，即为咖喱粉，用它来烹煮的食物就叫做咖喱。世界各地的咖喱料理千变万化，把香料杂糅成教人无以抗拒的撩人滋味。这一集的节目，郭亮，阿贤和Pornsak会为我们介绍东西方各地区的咖喱。.

programme.title: 拜托了，妈妈 All About My Mom - EP 23
programme.desc: Ep 23: Xuncai is vexed when Zhen-ai starts to avoid him. He decides to leave as he feels that Zhen-ai values her career more than their relationship. Zhen-ai stops him from leaving. Ep 23: 真爱一直避开勋才。勋才指真爱只懂得爱自己，害怕失去辛苦建立的事业，不敢谈恋爱。勋才为了不妨碍真爱的前途，决定搬走。正当勋才拖着行李离开，真爱追出来，挽留勋才。.

programme.title: 嫉妒的化身 Jealousy Incarnate - EP 17
programme.desc: Ep 17Nali worries that she may not make it back to the TV station in time for the senior anchor audition as she has to do outdoor filming on the same day. Tailuo seizes the opportunity to demand Zhengyuan to break up with Nali.Ep 18Nali follows Huaxin's instruction and handles all the ad hoc situations well during the anchor audition. Eventuall Ep 17娜丽收到资深主播试镜时间的短信后，担忧当天在外景录影会赶不及回电视台试镜。另一边也报名参加了主播试镜的珠熙看到娜丽在发愁，开始幸灾乐祸。正元去找母亲泰罗会长，请她调整试镜的时间。泰罗趁机提出了自己的条件，要正元和娜丽分手。Ep 18在考主播摄影测试时，娜丽按照华信的嘱咐很好地应对了各种突发状况。最终，娜丽以出色的表现赢得了现场所有人的赞许。另一方面，再也无法隐藏对娜丽爱慕之心的华信，向娜丽发出了单恋宣言。.

programme.title: 爸不得爱你 Father, I'll Take Care Of You - EP 25
programme.desc: Ep 25: Chengjun promises Ting-en that he will keep her relationship with Xianyu a secret from the rest of the family. Huizhu is upset when she sees how Changzhu has to cope with very little food and a lot of exercise under Xishu's surveillance. Ep 25: 成俊知道廷恩跟贤宇交往后答应帮廷恩保密。慧珠看到昌洙无法像以前一样随心所欲地吃东西，还被逼着去运动，觉得很难过。.

programme.title: 爸不得爱你 Father, I'll Take Care Of You - EP 26
programme.desc: Ep 26: Chengjun is worried when he hears that Xianyu has introduced Chengzhi to politicians and businessmen who are suspected to be involved in dubious dealings. He is even more suspicious of Xianyu's intention when he hears that Xianyu has rented an office space to Chengzhi at very low rental. Ep 26: 成俊听说贤宇将名声不好的政商界人士介绍给成植还便宜地将办公室租给成植，觉得不对劲，为成植感到担心。.

programme.title: 人间蒸发 Missing - EP 6
programme.desc: Around 35,000 persons are reported missing each year in the Philippines. This equates to one person vanishing every 15 minutes. Some disappeared due to mental health while some are enforced disappearance. Their families often find insurmountable challenges trying to locate their loved ones. 在菲律宾，每15分钟，就有一人失踪。过往的失踪者当中有被强行掳走的异议分子，也包括许多精神病患。失踪者家属穷心剧力寻找至亲，却往往碰到难以逾越的困难而心力交瘁。黑暗的尽头会是一片曙光吗？.

programme.title: 回转干探 Life On Mars - EP 10
programme.desc: In dealing with a kidnap case, Naying has to pose as a nurse to tend to an injured kidnapper. However, Chief Jin interferes and agitates the kidnappers. Detective Jiang gets injured while saving Taizhu from getting shot by the kidnapper. 挟持人质事件中，娜英再次当卧底扮护士，刑事科長金庆世与特攻队的出现扰乱了计划，激怒了犯人，便朝向泰柱开枪，东哲为了保护他，为他挡子弹受了轻伤。.

programme.title: 你那边怎样.我这边OK - 台湾篇 All Is Well - Taiwan - EP 3
programme.desc: (R) Teng Sheng Bank did not report the case. Wei Yun's cousin, Dong Jie is a police officer. He asked Wei Yun to release the news that Teng Sheng Bank's ATM has been robbed, wanting to use the pressure of public opinion to force the bank to report the case, so that the police is able to commence an official investigation. Wei Yun happily agrees. The Taiwan police officially formed an ATM hacking case team. Eric sees the news reports on the hacking case and has a bad feeling about it. (PG)(重)腾升银行没有报案，维芸的堂哥东杰是警察，要求维芸发布腾升银行提款机被盗领的新闻，欲以舆论压力逼银行报案，让警方有立场立案调查，维芸乐得照做。台湾警方正式成立ATM盗领案专案小组。Eric看见盗领案新闻，感觉大事不妙。.

programme.title: 你那边怎样.我这边OK - 台湾篇 All Is Well - Taiwan - EP 4
programme.desc: (R) Eric suspects that Justin had planned to involve him in the ATM hacking case, so he tries to contact him but Justin has cut off contact. Wei Yun finds a Teng Sheng Bank name card in Eric's clothes, and various signs lead her to suspect that Eric is involved in the ATM hacking case. She secretly goes on a yacht that Eric has rented to find clues for her report, but she accidentally encounters Ma Dong Bao, a killer hired by Li Hao...... (PG)(重)Eric怀疑Justin设计害他卷入ATM盗领案，尝试联络他，但Justin已完全失联。维芸从Eric的衣服中发现腾升银行的名片，根据种种迹象让她拼凑出Eric涉嫌盗领案。她偷偷溜上Eric租的游艇，想找线索报道，不料遇见李昊派来的杀手马东宝……。.

programme.title: 看见你的声音 I Can See Your Voice - EP 10
programme.desc: (R) "I Can See Your Voice" is a reality show in which guests must attempt to determine whether the contestant is a skilled vocalist or a tone-deaf contestant without hearing them sing. (重)《看見你的声音》是一档嘉宾凭视觉判断选手是否专业演唱实力还是音痴的新概念推理类音乐综艺节目。.

programme.title: 梦行者 Dream Walkers - EP 1
programme.desc: (R) Di Lun is a YouTuber who produces adventurous programs. While investigating the disappearance of a missing girl Bunny, he chances upon a mysterious teenager Tang Ning, and witness her vanishing into a white light. (PG-些许性相关语)(重)狄伦是个Youtuber，常制作一些探险节目，这晚跟三名好友去探险，想要查出失踪女生Bunny的下落。不料却碰上一名神秘少女唐凝，眼看着她在一道强光中消失了。.

programme.title: 拜托了，妈妈 All About My Mom - EP 24
programme.desc: (R) Hengkui dashes to Huizhu's house when he hears her screams over the phone. Huizhu's house is ransacked, but she stops Hengkui from calling the police. Hengkui stays in Huizhu's house the entire night to ensure that she is safe. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)亨奎拨电给惠珠问她公事。刚好惠珠回到家发现房子一片凌乱，不禁尖叫。亨奎担心，赶到惠珠家去，发现害怕的惠珠躲在屋里的一角发抖。亨奎要报警，却被惠珠阻止。亨奎很担心，坚持要一整晚待在惠珠的身边。.

programme.title: 嫉妒的化身 Jealousy Incarnate - EP 19
programme.desc: (R) Director Wu questions Huaxin angrily for altering the helicopter's route and informs him that the case has been referred to the disciplinary committee. He is worried that Huaxin may not be able to run for the position of the nine o'clock news anchor post because of this incident. Nali overhears their conversation and feels guilty for implicating Huaxin. (PG-些许性相关语)(重)(双声道-中/韩)吴局长生气地质问华信为什么改变直升机的航线，并且告诉他此事已提交到惩戒委员会了。局长担心华信会因为这件事不能参加九点新闻主播的竞选。娜丽无意间在外面听见，对华信为了帮她而遭处罚感到内疚。.

programme.title: 爸不得爱你 Father, I'll Take Care Of You - EP 27
programme.desc: Chengjun's impression of Xianyu worsens when he sees him with an unknown woman outside a motel. Xianyu offers to introduce a job to Chengjun, but he turns him down immediately. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)成俊看到贤宇在汽车旅馆外与一不知名的女子纠缠不清，跟廷恩说贤宇似乎不是正人君子。贤宇想为成俊介绍工作。成俊一口拒绝，还直说他觉得贤宇不可信。.

programme.title: 爸不得爱你 Father, I'll Take Care Of You - EP 28
programme.desc: Xishu proposes that she continues to be known as Zhixun's mother in public and only takes on the role of Changzhu's mother at home. Chengxun thinks that's a good idea as the boys will be burdened with gossips in school should they admit that they have been switched as babies. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)熙淑顾及自己的面子，要慧珠配合她，在人前让她继续扮演志勋的母亲，回家后才当昌洙的母亲。成勋觉得熙淑的想法不错，因为在这个时候向外承认孩子们对调的事将为孩子们带来不少压力。.

programme.title: 台湾1001个故事 3 Taiwan's 1001 Stories 3 - EP 10
programme.desc: Hosted by Bai Xinyi, this food programme introduces Taiwan's traditional cuisines and their ingredients and spices. It also discloses touching stories behind the cuisines. 介绍台湾在地食材的故事，也是台湾最深刻的人生故事。故事的主角们，有的为着有机农业奋斗打拼，为这片土地奉献青春与血汗。 有的则是经过千百次的调味与尝试，只为了成就一道美味料理。对比着经营者与料理人的故事，他们或是为生活中年转业、或是离乡背井追寻梦想，人生路上各自遭逢百转千折的冲突与适应，才能在逆境中成功蜕变。.

programme.title: 回转干探 Life On Mars - EP 11
programme.desc: A lady is found dead in a hotel room, the Police suspect Taizhu's father, Han Zhonghao, is the murderer. With the evidence against him, Taizhu gets upset about his father's character. (PG13-部分画面令人不安)(双声道-中/韩)自己的父亲成为嫌疑犯并遭通缉，这让泰柱不愿接受，但随着各种证据指向他不是好人，令泰柱失望。.

programme.title: 晚间新闻 News Tonight
programme.desc: A comprehensive half-hour news programme, NEWS TONIGHT provides viewers with important local, international and financial developments for the day. U频道《晚间新闻》，在半小时里除深入报道本地与国际要闻，还有详尽的财经新闻和体坛动态。世界局势与经济动脉，让大家轻松掌握。.

programme.title: 台湾1001个故事 3 Taiwan's 1001 Stories 3 - EP 10
programme.desc: (R) Hosted by Bai Xinyi, this food programme introduces Taiwan's traditional cuisines and their ingredients and spices. It also discloses touching stories behind the cuisines. (重)介绍台湾在地食材的故事，也是台湾最深刻的人生故事。故事的主角们，有的为着有机农业奋斗打拼，为这片土地奉献青春与血汗。 有的则是经过千百次的调味与尝试，只为了成就一道美味料理。对比着经营者与料理人的故事，他们或是为生活中年转业、或是离乡背井追寻梦想，人生路上各自遭逢百转千折的冲突与适应，才能在逆境中成功蜕变。.

programme.title: 台湾1001个故事 3 Taiwan's 1001 Stories 3 - EP 10
programme.desc: (R) Hosted by Bai Xinyi, this food programme introduces Taiwan's traditional cuisines and their ingredients and spices. It also discloses touching stories behind the cuisines. programme.title: 你那边怎样.我这边OK - 台湾篇 All Is Well - Taiwan - EP 5
programme.desc: (R) The engine on the yacht breaks down and it stops moving. Eric and Wei Yun are stranded in the sea, and they get to know each other better. Eric divulges to her that he is in conflict with the director at Teng Sheng Bank, and that his director would gladly make him the scapegoat for the incident. He tells her that he will find evidence by himself and use it to negotiate with the police. (重)游艇因机械故障失去动力，Eric和维芸受困海上，彼此有了进一步认识。Eric透露他跟腾升银行主管有矛盾，对方巴不得让他背黑锅。他表示自己会找到证据，再去跟警方谈判。游艇恢复动力得以靠港，Eric却看见马东宝守在码头…….

programme.title: 你那边怎样.我这边OK - 台湾篇 All Is Well - Taiwan - EP 6
programme.desc: (R) The Singapore police finds a program related to the Teng Sheng Bank hacking case from Eric's desktop and officially lists Eric as a wanted criminal. To dodge responsibility, Teng Sheng Bank categorises this as an employee theft, and vice president Guo Yan Feng appoints a lawyer to file an official summons against Eric to repay the bank 100 million yuan! (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)新加坡警方从Eric的住家电脑中发现与腾升银行盗领案有关的程序，正式将Eric列为通缉犯。腾升银行为了推诿责任，将事件定为银行职员监守自盗，副总裁郭延丰委任律师向台北地检署提出控告Eric，并要求他赔偿1亿元天价！.

programme.title: 梦想的声音 2 Sound Of My Dream 2 - EP 11
programme.desc: (R) Produced by the same people behind Sing!, Sound of My Dream boasts 5 top-notch mentors, (Sandy Lam, JJ Lin, Yu Quan Group, Jane Zhang), impressive sets and production, and a very unique contest format. The contest witnesses the challenges and preparation each mentor puts into their performances as they prove their worth. And it features stellar performances from mentors and amateurs alike. (重)本季四组常驻导师为羽泉、林忆莲、林俊杰和张靓颖，主持人为华少。另从本季开始新设立客座导师一位，称之为“神秘导师”，每期更换。第二季在选歌方式与上季不同，选歌、定歌都在录影前，练歌则是在录影前6小时之内完成（上季只有3小时，这季增加音樂導師练歌时间）；6小时后在舞台将直接接受追梦歌手讨教。.

programme.title: 巾帼女将 Women Warriors - EP 5
programme.desc: (R) In Cheng Du, Paige goes through a punishing regime with Sun Xue, training to be a qualified bodyguard to a spectrum of personalities ranging from dignitaries to billionaires to celebrities. She witnesses how it is crucial to remain calm in the face of terror and realises that one needs nerves of steel to be working as a professional human shield. (重)巾帼女将是一个表扬21世纪女性的节目。这系列一一列出所有有关女性种种美妙和美好的一面，从受访者轻松女性化的追逐到激烈行为的工作经历。每一集，绮慧将了解在地受访者以什么工作谋生。同时，在激烈的工作和训练中，她也了解受访者如何享受社交和家庭生活。.

programme.title: I'm Madam! - EP 1
programme.desc: (R) Pepper is a struggling social media influencer who is trying very hard to be famous but her career- popularity just isn't taking off. After her boyfriend, Hulk breaks up with her, Pepper gets even more agitated when she later learns that Hulk actually dumped her for a regular female officer, He Xinyi. She soon decides to join the army as an attempt to win back Hulk as well as a publicity attempt to bring in army followers to her channel. (重)Pepper是个失败的Influencer，失败到要去代言老人纸尿布。Pepper的男友Hulk这时和她提出分手，将Pepper更推入谷底。为了调查原因，Pepper找了自己和Hulk的好友，建东，要问个清楚。建东后来告知Hulk喜欢的是军官何欣怡，Pepper更是难受。Pepper最后决定当兵，增加她的follower,为了自己的事业，也为了能够让Hulk回心转意。.

programme.title: 长命百二岁 第一辑 As Long As You Live S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: (R) Award-winning programme "As Long As You Live" takes a look at how countries face the ageing population and what measures do they take to care for them. (重)全球人口老化，「长命百岁」已经过时，活到百二岁是迟早的事。究竟是祝福，还是诅咒？本台老中青三代记者走访多个亚洲地区包括香港，台湾，日本，南韩，了解他们对人口老化的看法。.

programme.title: 人间蒸发 Missing - EP 6
programme.desc: (R) Around 35,000 persons are reported missing each year in the Philippines. This equates to one person vanishing every 15 minutes. Some disappeared due to mental health while some are enforced disappearance. Their families often find insurmountable challenges trying to locate their loved ones. (重)在菲律宾，每15分钟，就有一人失踪。过往的失踪者当中有被强行掳走的异议分子，也包括许多精神病患。失踪者家属穷心剧力寻找至亲，却往往碰到难以逾越的困难而心力交瘁。黑暗的尽头会是一片曙光吗？.

programme.title: 上食堂 Food Notes - EP 4
programme.desc: (R) Food Notes embarks on a Dim Sum trail in Hong Kong! Check out the most iconic dim sum dishes and find out more about the interesting varieties of siew mai available. If you're a Dim Sum connoisseur, don't miss out on our visit to the first dim sum place here to be awarded one Michelin star! (重)节目让观众大快朵颐之际，也深入了解这些美食背后各个幕后英雄是如何让眼前的美食发扬光大。除了介绍各个厨师、馆子是如何使出十八般武艺烹煮美食外，节目也会将镜头转向养殖场、捕捞过程及相关行业，让观众更全面和深入的了解，这些美食的过去、现在甚至将来！.

programme.title: 守护家族 (Dual Sound) Save The Family - EP 71
programme.desc: (R) Zhengshu invites Meina and Tongbai home for a festival celebration. At the same time, Xizhen goes over to visit Zhengshu and finally finds out about the relationships among Yuncan, Meina and Tongbai. Xizhen slaps Yuncan out of anger and also quarrels with Zhengshu. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)政淑邀请美娜和桐白回家过节。熙真刚好也到允灿家拜访，发现允灿、美娜和桐白三人之间的关系。熙真觉得委屈，打了允灿一巴掌。政淑觉得允灿跟孩子见面是天经地义的，并说既然熙真已经答应收下公寓，就要接受这种安排。熙真觉得区区一间公寓不足以弥补她所受的委屈及羞辱，跟政淑闹翻。.

programme.title: 守护家族 (Dual Sound) Save The Family - EP 72
programme.desc: (R) Yiyuan proposes to pay a high price for the soy sauce's formula and trademark. In exchange, Haixiu has to tell the public that the soy sauce is formulated by ONE's Food. Shanying advises Haixiu not to give up the formula for short-term gains. Haixiu rejects Yiyuan's proposal. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)艺苑说会出高价收购魔法酱油的商标权和配方，条件是要对外宣布说研发人是ONE's食品。善英劝海秀千万别为了短视利益把自己拥有的独门秘访卖出去。海秀拒绝艺苑的合作提议。.

programme.title: 当你沉睡时 While You Were Sleeping - EP 3
programme.desc: (R) Zai Can dreamt of his brother, Sheng Yuan being apprehended whereas Hong Zhu dreamt he became a murderer. Both of them foresee Sheng Yuan will meet with danger so they try to prevent things from happening. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)(双声道-中/韩)红珠梦到胜元为了救邵允成为杀人犯而宰璨梦见弟弟被抓。两人将各自的梦组合起来，知道胜元将会发生悲剧，立刻阻止事情发生。.

programme.title: 当你沉睡时 While You Were Sleeping - EP 4
programme.desc: (R) Shao Yun and her mother stay in Hong Zhu's house to avoid her father, Pu Junmo. Hong Zhu urges Zai Can to help Shao Yun initiate a re-trial of her family violence case. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)为了躲避父亲朴俊模，邵允与母亲暂住在红珠家。红珠建议宰璨帮邵允重审朴俊模家暴案。.

programme.title: 声音的抉择 Singing Choice - EP 3
programme.desc: A music variety where the singer will compose a song and find the right voice to sing it. Featuring singers such as Li Quan, Gary Chaw, Jam Hsiao, Kenji Wu, A-Niu etc. 《声音的抉择》每两期会邀请一位华语乐坛制作人化身声音委托人来到现场，阐述自己的创作理念及择声的标准，通过这个平台为自己最新创作的优质单曲寻找契合的好声音；与此同时，每期节目中声音猎人推荐六位职业歌手，他们作为金曲试唱人站上《声音的抉择》的舞台向声音委托人和观众展示其真挚的歌声，同时借助这个平台寻找契合自己声音的旋律、寻找下一首成名曲。.

programme.title: 怪食记 Weird Food Diaries - EP 3
programme.desc: In "Weird Food Diaries", avid foodie Rosalyn Lee (also known as Rozz) goes in search of Asia's most bizarre eats. Rozz eats away across Japan, Vietnam, Cambodia, Taiwan, Thailand, Korea, Indonesia and the Philippines. Whether it's exotic street food or haute cuisine, Rozz is hungry to try it all! In this episode, there's never a dull moment in her weird food quest in the Thailand. (PG-部分画面令人不安)在“怪食记"中，狂热的美食家Rosalyn Lee（也称为Rozz）正在寻找亚洲最奇异的食物。Rozz在日本，越南，柬埔寨，台湾，泰国，韩国，印度尼西亚和菲律宾各地旅行,并尝试当地街头奇异美食还是高级美食。在这一集中，她将带大家去泰国品尝当地的奇怪的食物。.

programme.title: 偷天任务 Leverage - EP 7
programme.desc: Naxing finally reconnects with her long lost mentor, Renshu. She is sad to find Renshu staying in the nursing home now as a dementia patient. Naxing notices signs of physical abuse on Renshu's body during her visit. She asks the team for help to investigate on the nursing home's caregiving group. (PG-些许暴力画面)(双声道-中/韩)娜星终于联络上失散多年的导师仁淑。她到导师居住的疗养院探望她时，发现仁淑因失智症而住在疗养院，也注意到仁淑的身上有被虐待的伤痕，感到伤心。她请团友帮忙调查疗养院小组。.

programme.title: 看见看不见的你 I See You - EP 7
programme.desc: Kai En is sent by 748 to bring back Ceci, a social influencer who died from binge eating and refuses to move on until she has achieved her goal of becoming an internet sensation. Meanwhile, Shi Ping notices that a group of his classmates are behaving suspiciously - could they be the ones responsible for Kai En's death? (PG-灵异题材)748派遣凯恩逮捕因为暴食症去世的网红Ceci。Ceci在拥有上万粉丝的著名网红之前，拒绝前往投胎转世。世平在学校里发现可疑的学生。他们跟凯恩的“死”是否有关呢？.

programme.title: 儿子的战争 Remember - EP 26
programme.desc: (R) The judge sentences Guiwan to death with all the solid evidence. Guiwan goes mad on the spot. Guiwan goes berserk when he is sentenced to death. Jiang Xikui tells Xiufan about Guiwan's sentence. Xiufan thought he will be happy hearing it but instead he feels immense sadness. Jiang knows that is because they are friends. (PG)(重)(大结局)(双声道-中/韩)在一切证据都确凿的情况下，法官宣判圭万死刑，圭万当庭发狂。锡奎告诉秀范圭万被判死刑，秀范本以为自己会很开心，可心里却是很难受， 锡奎知道那是因为他们是朋友。.

programme.title: 异口同声 Who Is The Real Singer - EP 12
programme.desc: (R) Hosted by Chen Huan, Popstars and impersonators face off to be the last one standing as the panel of singing judges try to determine the real singer by listening to their voices only. (重)由陈欢主持《异口同声》是一个大型猜评推理音乐节目，由陈欢主持。节目邀请乐坛代表性歌手讲述金曲背后故事，同时邀请模唱歌手用他们以假乱真的声线向专业猜评团发起挑战。专业猜评团由张宇、黄国伦、刘维、魏巡、马松、冯提莫组成。.

programme.title: 美食世家 2 Food Empire 2 - EP 10
programme.desc: (R) From Thailand, Japan and Italy, three families have chosen Singapore to build their food empires. This week, these multi-generational food families let us into their kitchens to show off favourites like phad thai, freshly-made tagliatelle and the Singapore hawker classic - mee pok! (重).

programme.title: 食材地图 Our Daily Food - EP 8
programme.desc: (R) In this episode, Cui Fang learns about the cultivation of Liberica coffee beans in Malaysia and gets to pick the rare Matsutake mushrooms in Yunnan. Pornsak is in Australia to experience chocolate making and learns about the cultivation of black truffles. He also has fun picking longans in Thailand. (重)在这一集节目中，林翠芳前往马来西亚了解利比利卡咖啡豆的种植,并前往中国云南，跟随当地采菌人采摘珍稀的松茸。Pornsak则前往澳大利亚体验巧克力的制作和了解黑松露的培植。他也到泰国体验采摘龙眼的乐趣。.

programme.title: 奇异特工 Odd-upation - EP 3
programme.desc: (R) With the rise in awareness for environmental protection, monitoring odour pollution has become necessary. However, instead of machines, the human nose is relied upon to detect odour. What challenges do these people who sniff out foul smells face every day? Let's find out more with the host in China. (重)随着人们对环境保护意识的增强，针对恶臭污染的监测成了不可或缺的需求。但检测恶臭靠的不是机器，而是直接通过鼻子来判断。每天都必须与恶臭搏斗的工作到底有什么挑战性？请跟随奇异特工黄靖伦到中国一探究竟。.

programme.title: 非一般递送 Special Delivery - EP 9
programme.desc: (R) Host Carla Dunareanu travels to Bangkok to meet an extraordinary father-son pair. Walter and his boy Zy have scaled peaks like Mt Kilimanjaro, Gunung Kinabalu, Fuji-san and more. Zy is physically disabled and they are the heart and soul of "Climb to Change a Life". By organising climbs, they are empowering and inspiring parents and special needs children in South-east Asia to transcend the emotional and mental boundaries drawn by physical limitations and societal prejudice. (重)六位主持人，各有不同的背景却身负同样的使命 – 递送非一般的物品给有需要的族群。他们的任务遍布亚洲偏僻各地，将考验他们的恒心、毅力与韧性。 秉持完成递送任务的坚定目标， 主持人将带领观众踏上一趟趟希望之旅，透过13集节目，让观众们感受《非一般的递送》送出的每一份快乐和感动。.

programme.title: 整形背后 Plastic Surgery Is My Business - EP 1
programme.desc: (R) As one of the top plastic surgeons in Singapore, A-Prof Vincent Yeow constantly seeks balance between function and form. This episode juxtaposes the experiences of two patients in the journey towards cleft lip repair; one a baby about to take his first step, and another a teenager taking her last. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)身为新加坡其中一名顶尖整形外科医生，姚国龙副教授一直寻求功能与外观之间的平衡。两名病人因为兔唇找上了姚医生。一名是出生没多久的婴孩而另一名是青春年华的年轻人。.

programme.title: 守护家族 (Dual Sound) Save The Family - EP 73
programme.desc: (R) Haixiu questions Shanying when she sees Shanying eating medicine, but Shanying does not want to reveal her health condition to Haixiu. Haixiu asks Yuzhen about Shanying's condition and is shocked to find out that Shanying needs a kidney transplant. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)海秀看到善英吃药，追问善英是否患病。善英不向海秀坦白，海秀于是去找宇真，发现母亲需要肾脏移植。.

programme.title: 守护家族 (Dual Sound) Save The Family - EP 74
programme.desc: (R) The media reports favourably about the soy sauce marketed by ONE's Food. Shanying and Haixiu question Yiyuan about the ownership of the soy sauce and are treated roughly by Yiyuan. A reporter who witnesses the conflict reports about the dubious background of the soy sauce. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)新闻报道ONE's食品推出的魔法酱油，获得好评。善英到公司质问艺苑为何偷了海秀的酱油，被艺苑推倒在地。海秀赶到，同样与艺苑发生争执，过程被记者们记录下来。记者报道魔法酱油的配方主人其实另有其人。.

programme.title: 当你沉睡时 While You Were Sleeping - EP 5
programme.desc: (R) Zai Can and Hong Zhu bump into Han Yuzhuo, the man whom they saved from the tragic accident. He warned them that Lawyer Li Youfan will threaten Shao Yun and her mother. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)(双声道-中/韩)宰璨与红珠碰见在车祸被他们解救的男士韩禹卓。他告知他们律师李侑凡将会恐吓邵允与她母亲。.

programme.title: 当你沉睡时 While You Were Sleeping - EP 6
programme.desc: (R) Zai Can found evidence of misdeeds by Pu Junmo and pressed charges against him. Hong Zhu faces the dilemma of whether or not to resume her reporter work. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)宰璨找到起诉朴俊模的证据，把他绳之以法。红珠在犹疑是否该回到记者工作。.

programme.title: 我想和你唱3 Come Sing With Me 3 - EP 8
programme.desc: An interactive music variety show where ordinary people have an opportunity to sing together with celebrity pop singers. First, the celebrity pop singers featured in that episode (there are usually three total) are shown singing one of their well-known songs in the studio. Fans are shown singing along simultaneously in UGC clips showing people singing into their computers or mobile phones from wherever they are. Some are shown singing into their headphones from their offices, etc. 《我想和你唱第三季》除了继续延续前两季“星素同框同台合唱"的核心节目模式，还将星素互动环节进行了升级。该节目嘉宾阵容相比前两季会更年轻化，更多90后、00后喜爱的偶像都会参与进来。节目中新增的CALLOUT环节，邀请的大来宾会亲自电话邀请三位幸运观众，请他们24小时之内赶到录制现场，获得10秒同唱机会。.

programme.title: 偷天任务 Leverage - EP 8
programme.desc: The team discovers that the director of the nursing home, Rengao, and his father, Zongjiu, are abusing the dementia patients of the nursing home. The team therefore decides to teach the father and son a lesson. The team also finds out that Rengao has struck a deal with the Mayor to sell the nursing home for redevelopment despite his father's strong dissent. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)小组发现疗养院的院长仁镐和父亲宗九在疗养院虐待失智症患者，决定要教训宗九父子。小组发现仁镐不顾父亲强烈反对，与市长达成了协议要出售疗养院的土地以进行重建。.

programme.title: 看见看不见的你 I See You - EP 8
programme.desc: Shi Ping exorcises an old ghost from the body of a young man accused of being a peeping tom. It turns out that the old ghost, Zhang Xian, is searching for his first love, whom he only recognizes through a heart-shaped birthmark on her back. Shi Ping remembers that his grandmother, Siew Yue, has a birthmark on her back. Could Zhang Xian be his grandfather? Meanwhile, 748 goes to the Office Basement to seek out Hong Rui Xin, only to receive a shock... (PG-灵异题材)世平从一个偷看老女人上厕所而被逮捕的年轻人身上赶出老色鬼。这老色鬼张贤正在寻找他的初恋。他只记得她背后有个心形胎记。世平记得他的阿嬷秀月背后也有胎记，世平怀疑张贤就是自己的公公。748到地下室寻找洪蕊歆，不料却发生。。。.

programme.title: 晚间新闻 News Tonight
programme.desc: A comprehensive half-hour news programme, NEWS TONIGHT provides viewers with important local, international and financial developments for the day. U频道《晚间新闻》，在半小时里除深入报道本地与国际要闻，还有详尽的财经新闻和体坛动态。世界局势与经济动脉，让大家轻松掌握。.

programme.title: 太阳的后裔 Descendants Of The Sun - EP 1
programme.desc: (R) Captain Liu Shizhen and Sergeant Xu Daying went to get their handphone back from the thief at Haixing Hospital, but were mistaken as the gang's boss by Doctor Jiang Muyan. Liu Shizen later clarified to Jiang Muyan that he is a soldier and both fell in love at first sight. (PG-些许暴力画面)(重)(双声道-中/韩)大尉刘时镇与上士徐大英，到海星医院找小偷要回手机，却被医生姜暮研误以为是黑帮老大。刘时镇表明自己是军人身份后，与姜暮研在此番误会中一见钟情。.

programme.title: 守护者 The Guardians - EP 1
programme.desc: (R) Though Cambodia's civil war ended 30 years ago, victims who have lost their limbs to landmines reflect the lingering damage of the war. To rebuild peace among Cambodians, there is an active deminer, one who adopts orphans as well as an invisible hero who makes prosthetic limbs for landmine victims. (重)柬埔寨内战结束已有30年，却还有许多人仍活在战争的创伤中，因地雷导致终生残疾。有人通过排雷自我救赎，并收养与救助孤儿。有人办学校为伤残儿童提供教育，还有人为截肢者制作义肢，默默地做他们隐形的守护者。.

programme.title: 金星火星大不同 Mars Vs Venus - EP 26
programme.desc: (R) If you had the chance to re-live your life, would you rather choose to be the other gender? Let us find out what our guest artistes have to share about their life success and regrets. This rollercoaster episode filled with laughter and sorrow will definitely keep you glued to the screen! (重)(最后一集)如果有下辈子，你会要当男人还是女人？众艺人嘉宾要如何选择？节目中将探讨他们对成功与失败的定义并分享人生遗憾事。这会让他们做出别的选择吗？嘉宾们狂抛笑弹分享内心剖白，为这一系列划下美丽句点。.

programme.title: 拜托了，妈妈 All About My Mom - EP 25
programme.desc: (R) Caili says she does not mind that Hengshun is poor and without a proper job. The pair reconcile happily. Hengkui gets worried when Huizhu does not pick up her phone. He rushes to her house and is embarrassed when Huizhu is perfectly fine. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)采莉说不介意亨顺没钱、没权势，两人答应不再分开。亨奎拨电给惠珠，她却没接听。亨奎担心惠珠又遇到危险，赶紧冲到她家去，结果发现自己摆乌龙。.

programme.title: 嫉妒的化身 Jealousy Incarnate - EP 20
programme.desc: (R) Huaxin does not want to hide his love for Nali anymore. He wants Nali to make a choice between him and Zhengyuan. Nali feels guilty to see Huaxin and Zhengyuan fight over her and spoil their long term friendship. She decides to break up with both of them. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)华信再也不想埋藏自己对娜丽的爱意了，并要她在他和正元之中作出选择。娜丽见原是好友的华信与正元为了她而打架，害他俩多年的友谊破损，深感内疚，决定不与任何一人交往。.

programme.title: 爸不得爱你 Father, I'll Take Care Of You - EP 29
programme.desc: Xianyu is informed that Chengjun is not biologically-related to Xiangxie. Instead, Xiangxie brought him home from the orphanage. Wujing starts to investigate if Chengjun is actually Shangyu. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)贤宇听说成俊跟享燮其实没有血缘关系，而是被享燮从孤儿院带回家的。由于成俊被领养的时间点跟尚宇走失的时间点很接近，武景于是怀疑成俊就是尚宇。.

programme.title: 爸不得爱你 Father, I'll Take Care Of You - EP 30
programme.desc: Changzhu's school teacher is surprised by Changzhu's church performance. The teacher informs Xishu that Changzhu is gifted with an extraordinary talent and has the potential to become an outstanding vocalist. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)昌洙的老师在教堂看到昌洙唱歌的情景，觉得昌洙很有歌唱天分。老师告诉熙淑昌洙是少有的好嗓子，很有声乐家的潜质，令熙淑很惊讶。.

programme.title: I'm Madam! - EP 2
programme.desc: After going into BMT, Pepper comes to the shocking realization that army training isn't as easy as how she imagined it to be. In order to learn more about Hulk, Pepper decides to approach Hulk's best friend, Jian Dong, the medical officer. However, to get close him, Pepper will have to fake injury and make many excuses to see the medical officer. Will that eventually get her into trouble?` (PG)Pepper以为加入军队是容易的事情，并存有许多幻想。可是开始BMT训练以后，才发现原来是那么的辛苦。运动，跑步，SOC （Standard Obstacle Course）等她都做不来，表现十分差异。建东是BMT里的Medical Officer，发现Pepper假装受伤后，立刻向Sergeant Ong举报，结果Pepper被罚，让Pepper憎恨建东。后来建东找Pepper，告诉Pepper说现在当兵了，要有纪律和分寸，你和Hulk的事情，到了军营外面我会在帮你的。Pepper这时才对建东有所改观。.

programme.title: As Long As You Live S1 - EP 2
programme.desc: Award-winning programme "As Long As You Live" takes a look at how countries face the ageing population and what measures do they take to care for them. 全球人口老化，「长命百岁」已经过时，活到百二岁是迟早的事。究竟是祝福，还是诅咒？本台老中青三代记者走访多个亚洲地区包括香港，台湾，日本，南韩，了解他们对人口老化的看法。.

programme.title: 回转干探 Life On Mars - EP 12
programme.desc: Han Zhonghao seeks Taizhu to let him escapes. Taizhu realizes the reasons he is back to 1988. Unfortunately, Taizhu is saddened when his father is shot from behind. He found an inhaler at the site of the shooting. (PG13-部分画面令人不安)(双声道-中/韩)韩钟浩求泰柱放他走，泰柱这才明白为什么会回到1988年。他拿枪指着自己的父亲要他认错。没料到，有人朝钟浩背后开枪，目睹父亲在眼前遭枪杀，泰柱伤心不已,他在附近捡到一个哮喘吸入器。.

programme.title: 晚间新闻 News Tonight
programme.desc: A comprehensive half-hour news programme, NEWS TONIGHT provides viewers with important local, international and financial developments for the day. U频道《晚间新闻》，在半小时里除深入报道本地与国际要闻，还有详尽的财经新闻和体坛动态。世界局势与经济动脉，让大家轻松掌握。.

programme.desc: (R) Award-winning programme "As Long As You Live" takes a look at how countries face the ageing population and what measures do they take to care for them. (重)全球人口老化，「长命百岁」已经过时，活到百二岁是迟早的事。究竟是祝福，还是诅咒？本台老中青三代记者走访多个亚洲地区包括香港，台湾，日本，南韩，了解他们对人口老化的看法。.

programme.title: 你那边怎样.我这边OK - 台湾篇 All Is Well - Taiwan - EP 7
programme.desc: (R) Dong Huang learns from the TV news report that the process of him withdrawing the money was recorded down by Eric on his phone on the day of the testing. Shocked and angry, he questions Eric. Eric said that he was framed and asks Dong Huang to believe in him once more. But the two have lost their trust in each other and their years of friendship has come to nought. (PG)(重)栋煌从电视报道中得知那天的测试行动，自己取钱的过程竟然被Eric以手机录下，震惊又愤怒，质问Eric。Eric说自己是被陷害的，让栋煌再相信他一次。但两人已失去对彼此的信任，多年友情破裂。.

programme.title: 你那边怎样.我这边OK - 台湾篇 All Is Well - Taiwan - EP 8
programme.desc: (R) Eric accidentally causes Dong Huang to be injured. He learned from the news that Andre has fled to the south, and calls Zhen Di for help to look after Dong Huang while he heads to the south to look for Andre. Before leaving, Eric apologises to Dong Huang, and reveals to him what he has been through all these years. The two finally reconciles. (PG)(重)Eric意外导致栋煌受伤，他从新闻得知安德烈往南部逃窜，便打电话给甄蒂求助，请她来照顾栋煌，自己决定动身往南部寻找安德烈的下落。离去前，Eric向栋煌道歉，坦诚道出自己这些年的心路历程，两人终于和好。.

programme.title: JML Home Shopping - Infomercial
programme.desc: Programme is not available for live streaming. 直播节目暂时无法观看。.

programme.title: 进击的台湾 2 Hello Taiwan S2 - EP 4
programme.desc: (R) This programme takes a look at some of Taiwan's famous eateries and dishes. Most importantly, the programme also reveals the moving story behind its success. (重)介绍台湾当地的美食与它们成功背后的故事.

programme.title: 十大新加坡 Top 10 Singapore - EP 6
programme.desc: (R) Many Singaporeans find parenting to be an uphill task. Besides providing the basics, our modern tiger parents fight hard to enable their children to stay ahead of the rat race, and this doesn't end until their children are well into their adulthood. "Top 10 Singapore" discuss their biggest worries. (重)现代家长真不好当，要替孩子担心的事，从衣食住行到学业成绩，一样都不能少，而且凡事都要求高，要求好。在这样的时代里，父母要如何让孩子赢在起跑点，并一路为他们打气到他们成家立业？本集节目请来虎爸虎妈们畅谈十大育儿担忧！.

programme.title: 拜托了，妈妈 All About My Mom - EP 26
programme.desc: Yingshan discovers that Xuncai is in a relationship with Zhen-ai and they are even staying under one roof. Yingshan suspects that Zhen-ai knows that Xuncai is her son and has an ulterior motive for getting near to Xuncai. 英善发现勋才跟真爱谈恋爱，勋才还跟真爱住在同一个屋檐下。英善怀疑真爱早就知道她和勋才的关系，担心真爱是有目的接近勋才的。.

programme.title: 嫉妒的化身 Jealousy Incarnate - EP 19
programme.desc: Ep 21Huaxin is furious when he learns from Huiyuan that Nali has gone for a blind date again. Zhengyuan spoils things for Nali, causing her to feel angry and embarrassed. programme.title: Super Samayal 3 (HD) - EP 23
programme.desc: Chef Arifin will dish up a unique Iraqi dish called Dolma on today's episode. Do not miss it!

programme.title: Anjaraipetti Sr 7 - EP 244
programme.desc: Anjaraipetti takes cookery onto a new level, transforming the foodies into passionate chefs. The show helps viewers hone their culinary skills and brings a new flavour to their kitchen, different from the ones they are used to.

programme.title: Priyasakhi - EP 225
programme.desc: 'Priyasakhi' is about the life of Dhivya. She has parents who are uncaring and partial, siblings who are jealous and cunning, husband who married her just for challenge and thrill, and in-laws who are unsympathetic and refuse to endorse the marriage.

programme.title: Ishq Ka Rang Safed - EP 0308&0309
programme.desc: Ishq Ka Rang Safed is set amidst the traditional old city of Banaras in Northern India. Biplab is the carefree, spoilt grandson of the town leader who is slated to go abroad for his law studies. His life takes an abrupt turn when he encounters Dhaani. Dhaani, a young widow leading a life of dignity abiding by her Dharma is a conformist, yet a strong minded individual.

programme.title: Motu Patlu 3 - EP 54
programme.desc: Motu and Patlu, two friends living in Furfuri Naga, have a penchant to land themselves in comical situations, later rescuing themselves only by sheer luck. A criminal named John, intends to become a don, but his plans always fail due to the heroic actions of Motu and Patlu, who trap and expose him and his plans.

programme.title: Theriyatha Tamil Cinema 3 - Thirai Isai Paadalgal(HD) - EP 21
programme.desc: Theriyatha Tamil Cinema Thirai Isai Paadalgal is an hour long entertainment that features golden numbers ranging from all eras written by epic lyricists like Kannadasan, Vaali, Vairamuthu, Pa Vijay, etc. Note-worthy lyrics that add more beauty and meaning to the Tamil language will be discussed.

programme.title: Anjaraipetti Sr 7 - EP 312
programme.desc: Anjaraipetti takes cookery onto a new level, transforming the foodies into passionate chefs. The show helps viewers hone their culinary skills and brings a new flavour to their kitchen, different from the ones they are used to.

programme.title: Adukku Veetu Annasamy - EP 11
programme.desc: The entire neighbourhood is shocked to know that spirits are roaming around their houses! Arokkiyasamy is planning to rent out a single room in his house to a tenant to earn extra money. Jayabarathi, too, has a very close encounter with the supernatural in Panchacharam's house itself! And this leads to the neighbourhood taking some drastic actions - they bring in various 'Bomohs' to cleanse their neighbourhood and all hell breaks loose!

programme.title: Kannum Kannum Kollaiyadithal - EP 30
programme.desc: It's been a week since Tara's demise. This experience is very traumatic for Lavanya, something she will never forget or perhaps never get over. Sathya tries to console Karthik over his loss of Tara and tries to convince Karthik that Pettikadai's future will be only secured if Karthik undertakes the leadership role.

programme.title: Tamil Seithi - EP 263
programme.desc: Tamil Seithi focuses primarily on local and international news, information and current affairs. Catch the online news portal at http:--seithi.mediacorp.sg-.

programme.title: Thilaanaa - EP 28
programme.desc: Gitanjalis universe collides with a like-minded soul called Shiva, whose one love in life is dance. Through Shiva, Gitanjali meets 5 girls from different walks of life, deterred from practicing dance. Through Deva, Gitanjali meets Shakthi and his almost defunct dance group. Determined to reconnect them to their purpose, Gitanjali rediscovers herself along the way. Their lives unfold like a dance repertoire, with each movement bringing them towards the next stage of their existence.

programme.title: Ethiroli 16 (HD) - EP 38
programme.desc: Ethiroli goes in depth into local stories and major events happening around the world.

programme.title: Arivaan - EP 24
programme.desc: Hari is an ex-cop with ESP powers. 6 years ago, he pursued a serial killer with the help of his powers. He lost his job and wife in the process. Broken, he begins a life of quiet existence. Present day, the serial killer resurfaces. And Hari appears to be the only one who can catch him. What will Hari have to sacrifice in order to capture the man who made him lose everything? Arivaan, an intense psychological thriller, pits two men in a brutal cat and mouse game.

programme.title: Iruvar (HD) - EP 37
programme.desc: Sahana is a celebrated author who draws lifeblood and purpose from her work. She announces her next novel amidst much fanfare.
